alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk Valley; Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley; Noatak Valley; North Slopes of the Western Alaska Range; South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys; Upper Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 10 at 1:14PM AKST until November 13 at 4:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Western Interior and Northwestern Alaska. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
